messages.subject: Physics - was Introduction
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/21/2004 12:58:59 PM Eastern Standard Time, pamsoroosh@mac.com writes: OH OH --  I have a book for you. Thinking Physics -- here is
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/21/2004 12:58:59 PM Eastern Standard Time,
pamsoroosh@... writes:

OH OH -- I have a book for you.

"Thinking Physics" -- here is something from the back cover:


Thanks Pam! What a great sounding book. Admittedly, not a physics-head
myself, I'm sure we'll both get something from it. I'm off to find it right now.

Thanks, too, for taking the time to explain your thoughts on the physics
learning process. I also just read a quote similar to the one you sited,
(paraphrasing) 'In school we learn the lesson and then take the test. In life we
take the test and then learn the lesson.'

Linda in Ann Arbor
Eberwhite@...
